articles.title: Bernie Marsden, Whitesnake Guitarist and ‘Here I Go Again’ Co-Writer, Dies at 72 - Variety
articles.description: Bernie Marsden, the original guitarist for English hard rock band Whitesnake, died “peacefully” on Aug. 24, according to a social media post from his family. He was 72. “On behalf of hi…
articles.content:
Bernie Marsden, the original guitarist for English hard rock band Whitesnake, died “peacefully” on Aug. 24, according to a social media post from his family. He was 72.

articles.author: Benjamin Parkin, Peggy Hollinger
articles.title: The new contest to land on the Moon - Financial Times
articles.description: India’s successful landing is the latest manifestation of renewed interest in lunar exploration, driven both by national pride and strategic considerations
articles.content: A roar of triumph swept across mission control in Bengaluru as Chandrayaan-3s lander gently touched the lunar surface on Wednesday. India is on the Moon, said a smiling and obviously relieved S Soman… [+10521 chars]

articles.title: AMD announces RX 7800 XT and RX 7700 XT graphics cards to face off against RTX 4070 and 4060 Ti - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Digital Foundry breaks down AMD's RX 7800 XT and RX 7700 XT graphics card announcements, including performance analysis and thanks to Yeston for fresh colours.
articles.content: AMD has officially unveiled its RX 7800 XT and RX 7700 XT graphics cards, finally completing its RDNA 3 lineup after announcing its first GPUs in November last year. Both cards are intended to target… [+4576 chars]

articles.title: Starfield 'Doesn't Really Even Get Going' Until Players Finish the Main Quest, Bethesda Exec Says - IGN
articles.description: Bethesda head of publishing Pete Hines has said Starfield “doesn’t even really get going” until after the main story mission is completed.
articles.content:
